rooms.name: Living Room with Courtyard Access

rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for an open plan feel.

rooms.name: Kitchen Studio

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Studio
rooms.description: Spacious master studio with Vastu optimized layout for restful sleep. West-facing windows ensure natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Studio
rooms.description: Cozy guest room integrated into the split-level design.

rooms.name: Private Bathroom
